simpledc.title: Philosophy at Cambridge
Philosophy at Cambridge, Newsletter of the Faculty of Philosophy, Issue 13
simpledc.creator: Lecky-Thompson, Jenni
simpledc.subject: philosophy
simpledc.description: Newsletter of the Philosophy Faculty. Articles: Tim Crane. 'From the Chair', New Centre for the Future of Intelligence; Sophia Connell, 'Aristotle on Female Animals'; John Marenbon, 'China Matters'; Rae Langton, 'Accommodating Injustice'; N. Krishna, 'On Anecdotes and their Uses'; New Directions project update.
